short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Refresh the HashTags every minute and give the option to copy it to the user clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension will help you get the latest tags into the browsers.
It will refresh the tags almost every minute.
You can click the hashtag from the context menu to copy it and use it anywhere.
If you found a bug while using it please report us https://pmimrankhan.com/contactus

 We will add more features in the upcoming release, so stay tuned. 
This is the beta version.
